name: ShieldMaidens
description:
Free demo currently available!
If you play the demo then feedback in the comments or on discord would be extremely appreciated. Pillage mode is included along with with 3 set runes, however some of the features mentioned below like settlement building won't be playable until early/full release.

What is ShieldMaidens?

ShieldMaidens is a solo/co-op endless runner where you have to fight and block your way through enemies, but be on your toes as you also may encounter more elite enemies who require quick wits and reactions to defeat. If you’re unable to beat them on your first try, you can return to your settlement and construct buildings that unlock useful upgrades, weapons, runes or potions for getting back out there!

How do I fight and improve?

Every player holds a shield, but your secondary weapon is up to you! Charge in with a sword or hang back with  a bow. Second to this, you can attach runes to your shield granting extra powers and abilities - mix & match these to alongside your chosen weapon to find a play-style that suits you best

  • More runes & abilities
  • More randomly spawned map parts
  • A wider array of non-elite enemies
  • Increase local multiplayer capacity & controller selection
  • More weapons
